name: Cruise Control
description:
Description
Escape pursuing cops, helicopters, dinosaurs, giant eagles and vector polygons. With easy to pick up gameplay, three endless levels and rocking 80's inspired graphics and soundtrack! Grab powerups and coins to clear the road and unlock all the cars!

Game Features
- Free to play!
- Intuitive one touch controls.
- Play in portrait or landscape mode.
- Explosive fast paced infinite driving action.
- Leaderboards: compete for high scores.
- Killer synthwave soundtrack by Vector Hold.
- Tons of cars to collect.
- Laserdactyls.
- Control Time
- Share replays with your friends!
